MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L9 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Ormskirk Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.09AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required to a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.20PM on 21st January 2021.
